article_title: How Gov. Nikki Haley’s speech compares with S.C. actions
article_text:
Haley’s GOP response to State of the Union was well-received nationally

Some see a striking contrast in national Haley and South Carolina Haley

S.C. governor tops the list of possible vice-president picks

article_metadata.news-keywords: South Carolina governor, Nikki Haley, Republican, State of the Union, GOP response, vice president, candidate, election
article_metadata.description: If Americans outside of South Carolina didn’t know Nikki Haley’s name before, a lot more definitely know it now.
